title: Kaspersky Rescue Disk 10.0.32.17 from 2017.12.01 - { Latest}
description:
Kaspersky Rescue Disk 10.0.32.17 from 2017.12.01 - { Latest}

Kaspersky Rescue Disk is a boot disk from a well-known developer that contains a Kaspersky Anti-Virus scanner. In short, the boot disk is ideal for removing viruses and other malicious software when you can not boot the system in the wake of a virus attack, or if you do not want to infect other personal computers on your local network.

After downloading, you will get an ISO image that you need to write to a disk or USB device, then you need to select the item responsible for booting from the disk in the BIOS settings, then reboot the system and you can safely scan the desired hard disk and perform other operations.

Kaspersky Rescue Disk will allow you to find and delete viruses as efficiently as possible because the Windows system will not boot, which means that all threats will be idle and will not prevent scanning or work.

Developer : Kaspersky
License : FreeWare
Language : Multi + Russian
Size : 295 MB
OS : Windows
